product_name: The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Designed to improve your warmth on cold winter nights while reducing the weight you need to haul by day, The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag is insulated with performance Heatseeker(TM) Pro. Continuous-filament and cut-staple Heatseeker&38482; Pro insulation maximizes thermal performance. With a European Norm (EN) comfort rating of 9degF, the Snow Leopard is a versatile bag for cool-season backpacking adventures when temps dip into the single digits. Efficient design provides warmth in sub-freezing temperatures without sacrificing compressibility. Offset quilted bottom reduces cold spots where your body rests against the ground. Women-specific fit and design place more insulation around the chest and feet for optimal warmth. Draft collar for comfort and to prevent heat loss. Pad loops for attaching the bag to a sleeping pad (sold separately). The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag for women includes a compression sack and storage sack.
short_description: Designed to improve your warmth on cold winter nights while reducing the weight you need to haul by day, The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag is insulated with performance Heatseeker(TM) Pro.
